Class FireWeaponComponent

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener
public class FireWeaponComponent
extends GameComponent

Make a ranged weapon fire at a regular interval, one round at a time.. later, this may be sub classed for burst fire, charged weapons (ie. Lightning guns), etc.

xealgo
